column4: Does anyone have experience with the Avant Windows Manager? The Preference and change of icon is unresponsive. Is there something imediate i can do or should i just try a reinstall via aptitude?
try kxdockers instead or there is also an evolution doc bar
check in synaptic,  do a search for sun-java and make sure the pluggin package and the bin package are also installed,  and you can try reinstallling all of the sun-java6 packages, that might help
